lines.text: Who is this woman who walks through the She Zone with male scum?

The last city still stood. The remaining home of what was left of the civilization of New Terra. The society had been all but destroyed by the Robot Rebellion of '33, when the robots had turned on their masters, by the billions. The ensuing chaos had led to a radiation spill far more deadly than any nuclear warfare. The world had been brought to its knees by the... robot holocaust.
Sometimes people can be helped for no reason other than human charity.
Men, you're all useless and crazy.
I am but a simple man, Dark One. A man who is, clearly, no match for your powers.
And yet, you breathe the poisoned air.
Perhaps a visit to the power station will loosen your tongue. Torque, take him.
Deep in the power station lies the pleasure machine, a reward for those who loyally serve the Dark One.
We must be quiet from here on in.
Their labor fuels the power station. The station cleanses the atmosphere so that the workers can continue to fuel the power station.
All that remained of Jorn was his head. The rest of him had been absorbed into the Dark One.
